CHAT.comment: Chi's letter is written very neatly. She finished it quickly and easily. Chi included all of Mot's suggestions. She confirmed the spelling of favorite and beautiful. Mot gave her an incorrect spelling for sincerely , but helped when Chi had questions about punctuation. Mot also suggested that Chi include the date.

u.a: there is a lot of noise from the street on the tape
the first sentence of Chi's letter is <I liked your book>
MOT is reading from Chi's letter

g.ga: the sliding glass door that's letting lots_of noise in

u.a: MOT and EXP talk very briefly about closing the door
MOT asks if the incense is bothering EXP
